title: AUTOMOTIVE MECHATRONICS  TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements:
Five (5) SSC credit passes in Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) subjects from

Biology/Agricultural Science

Technical Drawing,

Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,

Auto Mechanics,

Metal Work,

Woodwork,

Further Mathematics,

English Language,

Geography,

Economics/Commerce.

title: ELECTRICAL & ELECTRONIC TECHNOLOGY
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3) relevant subjects.

title: WELDING & FABRICATION
utme_requirements: Five (5) credit passes at SSC or its equivalent in Mathematics, English Language and any other three (3)  relevant subjects.
